Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: OW TO CALCULATE THE VALUE OF ONE TELCOIN  We are selling 25% of the whole telcoin supply during this ICO. Put differently, this means that all the funds invested during the pre-ICO and ICO phase will stand for 25% of the whole telcoin supply value. And because we have a limited telcoin supply of 100 billion coins, the value of 1 telcoin will be calculated automatically at the very end of the ICO using the following formula:  (Total amount of funds raised during the pre-ICO and ICO phases) ÷ 25% ÷ 100,000,000,000  Ex: If we reach out hardcap of $25M, the value of 1 telcoin will be $0.001  Memo: We used to say we're selling 20% of the supply and keep 5% bonus pool separately, but for technical reasons we have merged this two entities into a 25% pool.  WHAT BONUS CAN I GET?  ・100 ETH: 5% bonus (limited to first 100 ppl) ・150 ETH: 7% bonus (limited to first 75 ppl) ・200 ETH: 10% bonus (limited to first 50 ppl) ・250 ETH: 12% bonus (limited to first 30 ppl) ・300 ETH: 15% bonus (limited to first 20ppl)  If you plan to invest more than 500 ETH, contact us directly to discuss a custom bonus.  We also have a cumulative time bonus which unfolds as follow:  ・+10% if the investment is made before we reach $10M equivalent in ETH. ・+5% if the investment is made when we have gathered between $10M and $20M equivalent in ETH.  Ex: If you make an investment of 300 ETH now, you will get access to 15+10=25% bonus.  We also offer a 5% referral bonus. If you refer a friend to invest into our ICO, you are eligible to a bonus equal to 5% of the amount invested by the friend you've referred. To achieve this, please provide them with the public key address you registered with us and make sure they enter it as a referral address.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Thank you for the kind words!!!  We will be starting in the North-African/West-Europe & SEA/North-Asia corridors

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Holy Hell, lol, so many! That's the beauty of starting a company in such a new space. As with any startup if you make a mistake, you learn, iterate, and innovate.  A lot of the things we've learned are based around Organizational Behavior, interacting with such a diverse community (interest levels, knowledge, talent, cultures, etc), how to explain the tech/concept/business model in the vernacular of said communities, cross-functional work, and more.  Its startup life. We've identified a problem/pain-point and we created a solution we feel addresses that. Everyone is doing everything and we are all driven to make this a success for not only ourselves but for those contributing, the telcos, and the people in developing countries that will have access to crypto.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Thank you for the words of encouragement! We are actually good friends with the OmiseGo team but differentiate ourselves by using the telecoms as intermediaries also, OmiseGo is primarily an e-wallet platform.  To get a better understanding of who we are you can check out publications we've been featured on including Inc., CNBC, and South China Morning Post. https://www.telco.in/#s_newsroom

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: We are focusing on remittances for our first use case. This will include the North African - Western Europe & South East Asian - North Asian corridors. We have and are still speaking with a lot of telco as you can imagine, they are at the center of our business model so we're constantly in touch with them. It does usually takes a long time, but thanks to our co-founder, Paul, we've been able to shorten this timeframe and got greenlighted in some of the biggest Telco groups like Etisalat, Veon and MTN. We'll be starting POC within these groups network first half of next year. The way we include them in our business model, giving them a big financial incentive in the distribution of telcoin, actually helps a lot to speed things up.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: We currently do not have any patents as we are not developing any new technology. However, innovation can be created via complimentary assets and improving existing business models. Albeit not having a patent, we feel what we are doing is quite innovative

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Thanks for the questions!  Interoperability is the key, operators can't make something that can be sent between networks, look at mobile money. By having a coin that is heavily accessible and distributed, we can actually grow the cryptocurrency economy and benefit the Telco at the same time. Moreover, it's all about scale, mobile money or a bespoke single operator coin cannot scale outside of its network. To reach scale, it needs to be available.  If you have any more questions, we will be uploading a new version of our WP on our website by the end of the weekend. It should have all the answers you need. If not, then join our telegram community to ask anything else you want https://t.me/telcoincommunity

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Well the majority of our idea's are how to build out our financial inclusion platform which will include a suite of services such as micro-financing based on telco powered geo-location data. That is far from a distant possibility, more of an eventual complementary asset to our existing services.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Our CAC is the 50% of the telcoin issuance that we are giving to the telco's, as they will be distributing that to their customers to use.

Body: Sign up for our Whitelisting https://docs.google.com/forms/u/1/d/e/1FAIpQLSfLKu393LkGGFONz38bM2hIp4tGTJZhflnk7LgfYXdyYpFReg/viewform

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: The total addressable market is technically the amount of cellphones there are which is about 5B (compared to 1.5B bank accounts). That is why we are doing this, as to spread financial inclusion and cryptocurrency adoption.   Telcoin is a cryptocurrency given to and distributed by your national telecom operator that allows mobile money users to easily and securely send telcoin to each other instantly.  Even easier....  Telcoin uses your telecom providers existing systems to send remittances (our first use case) cheaper and faster than current available solutions.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Our team is currently 11 members strong! For some more information on us check out our team page here https://www.telco.in/index.html#s_team  Also, we just recently had live interviews with "CNBC Street Signs" & "Bloomberg Radio". Claude, our CEO, was invited to speak about Telcoin and what we are doing.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: I would say the need for financial inclusion and a way to securely and affordably send mobile money across borders. All of us here in JP are all from different parts of the globe and we have experienced the pain points in sending money home/abroad. Also, we are super bullish on blockchain/crypto as a way for people in developing nations to have access to the global economy.  Personally (chris) I joined the team because I found the disaster relief use case to be fascinating. I read about the California wildfires and donations centers receiving 3,000 toothbrushes & toothpastes. Most of which would be thrown away. What they (those affected by disasters) really need is some monetary help that would help with provisions that doesn't need to come from a centralized authority like NPO's, NGO's, or governmental agencies (too slow...i.e. FEMA). Using Telcoin, we would be able to send out tokens directly to people's mobile wallets (in geo-fenced specific regions) that could be used immediately. I thought the social impact was awesome

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: We've seen similar ideals and intent, but none that are working exclusively with Telecoms. Moreover, our chairman Paul has a MASSIVE competitive advantage to others as his previous telecom experience gets us in conversation with telecom (and thus central banks/regulators) executives directly. The ability to get these conversations with decision makers is extremely difficult if you don't have an in.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: I bit confused on the questions. My story above was just an example of how donations, albeit the good intentions, sometimes are not exactly what people need (my CA fire story was in a developed country, image a developing nation). With Telcoin however, I was trying to say that we would be able to send our token which could translate to fiat and allow that to help disaster victims. Sorry if this wasn't clear   In trying to answer your question, Telcoin at the moment cannot be used to purchase anything. Our first use case is the sending of our token as a remittance service to/from mobile money users globally via the telecoms system.

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: We are still confirming which ones we will be listed on and which would allow for the easiest and most efficient way of exchanging. We are targeting the top exchanges (depending on region and regulatory challenges). I'll keep you updated once we get full confirmation.  Which exchanges do you use or have found to be best for your needs?

Author: telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Hey! Thanks for the support and the kind words!  Here is how to calculate the price of Telcoin:  We are selling 20% of the whole telcoin supply during this ICO. Put differently, this means that all the funds invested during the pre-ICO and ICO phase will stand for 20% of the whole telcoin supply value, and because we have a limited telcoin supply of 100 billion coins, the value of 1 telcoin will be calculated automatically at the very end of the ICO using the following formula:  (Total amount of funds raised during the pre-ICO and ICO phases) ÷ 20% ÷ 100,000,000,000  Ex: If we reach out hardcap of $25M, the value of 1 telcoin will be $0.00125

Author: alix_telcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: Thank you for your question! At Telcoin we deeply believe market reach matters when it comes to mass market adoption. Mobile operators are in a unique position where their products, feature phones or smartphones, are in the pockets of more than 5 billions people worldwide. It's hard to find any product that can beat that, and it's definitely one of the reason why we work with them.  But it's not all, mobile operators are also important to improve some problems currently found in the crypto space, like trust issues and KYC practices.  As for transaction fees, there will be no specific transaction fee applied to the use of Telcoin. The fee deduction will happen between us and the operator. About this specific point, I invite you to consult our white paper, where you will be able to know more in details about how we will work with telecom operators.  If you have more questions, don't hesitate to join our telegram group: http://t.me/TelcoinCommunity

Author: justlinux
Title: [ANN][ICO - FINISHED!!!] Telcoin - Cryptocurrency for a Mobile World
Body: very interesting. I really like the disaster relief use-case posted here: https://medium.com/@telcoin/how-cryptocurrencies-can-make-transparent-disaster-relief-really-work-46c8ddc38cad  I get that telcoin enables immediate donations to the locals in need, but it assumes mobile money in the local region affected by the disaster is still being accepted, right? would be cool to somehow help locals get cash out too.
